table.name: crm_uf_field
table.comment: User Framework fields and their properties.

field.name: uf_group_id
field.comment: Which form does this field belong to.

field.name: field_name
field.comment: Name for CiviCRM field which is being exposed for sharing.

field.name: is_active
field.comment: Is this field currently shareable? If false, hide the field for all sharing contexts.

field.name: is_view
field.comment: the field is view only and not editable in user forms.

field.name: is_required
field.comment: Is this field required when included in a user or registration form?

field.name: is_registration
field.comment: Is this field included in new user registration forms?

field.name: is_match
field.comment: Is this field part of the key for matching users to contacts?

field.name: visibility
field.values: User and User Admin Only,Public User Pages,Public User Pages and Listings
field.comment: In what context(s) is this field visible.

field.name: listings_title
field.comment: Page title for listings page (users who share a common value for this property).
